oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chancery Sale Handbill
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Advertisement for the sale of "104 Acres of Land in Davidson County, about twelve miles from Nashville, one mile from the Murfreesborough Turnpike, upon which Seaborn Gay now lives." 8 x 10 in.

Land
Davidson County (Tenn.)
